text: Samuel Alejandro García Sepúlveda (born 28 December 1987) is a Mexican politician. He is a member of the Citizens' Movement party. He became Governor of Nuevo León in 2021. He was a senator from 2018 to 2021. He was a candidate for President of Mexico in the 2024 election. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Nuevo León Category:People from Monterrey Category:Mexican lawyers
title: Samuel García (politician)
